name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Keyboard controls for HBO Nordic web player

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds simple keyboard controls to the HBO Nordic web player.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds simple keyboard controls to the HBO Nordic web player enabling you to play/pause the video by pressing the space bar, control the volume with the up/down arrow keys, skipping with left/right arrows keys and number keys.

*** Version 2.1: ***
Includes:
 * Playback speed controls
